chopper.name: Chopper
chopper.description: Chop and gather wood from the forest. Humans don't notice.

shinebandit.name: Shine Bandit
shinebandit.description: Sneak into the human village and steal shiny metals. Be careful - too many of these and humans may notice!

catcher.name: Catcher
catcher.description: Catch critters scurrying around the forest. Humans don't notice.

snacker.name: Snacker
snacker.description: Find and take little snacks from the humans. They have so many you would think they wouldn't notice, but be careful - too much of this and they might

watcher.name: Watcher
watcher.description: Observe the humans and take notes. We can learn things from their weird behaviours. Why does the toilet seat need to be down anyway?!
